title: The Best-est Party Looks of the Week
text:
Photo: Getty Images

This week brought a wave of matching sets all over the world. As we saw at London Fashion Week, the best way to get dressed is in a suit, set, or color-coordinated unitard (as EJ Johnson did). Iris Law taught us the secret to high-low dresses (lots of ruffles). Tom Grennan looked comfy and cool in velvet pants and a billowy top. Julia Varvara is bringing back the belted blazer, and Melissa Satta celebrated Vogue Japan with animal prints and space buns. Who wore the best look? Scroll down to find out.

Most Glam Jewel Tones: EJ Johnson

Photo: Michael Kovac/Getty Images for Ketel One

At Billy Porter’s Marvelous 50th Birthday.

Most Likely to Be a Real-Life Angel: Iris Law

Photo: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for LOV

At the LOVE & YouTube LFW party at the Standard.

Best Statement Short: J Rick

Photo: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for The

At the JW Anderson party at the Stratford.

Best Lasso-less Cowboy Look: Chris Burt-Allan

Photo: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for YSL

At the YSL New Fragrance 2019 U.K. launch party at Somerset House.

Best Kill Bill Cosplay: Julia Varvara

Photo: Max Cisotti (C)/Dave Benett/Getty Images

At the launch of London’s finest Penthouse at the Four Seasons, Ten Trinity Square.

Best “Horse-Girl” Chic Look: Melissa Satta

Photo: Daniele Venturelli/Daniele Venturelli/ Getty Images

At the Vogue Japan 20th-anniversary party.

Comfiest Set: Tom Grennan

Photo: Tudor Gaescu/Dave Benett/Getty Images for BYR

At the Craig McDean x Edward Enninful x Ben Gorham cocktail party.

Best Glasses-Tux Combo: Jim Parsons and Ryan O’Connell

Photo: Charley Gallay/Getty Images for Netflix

At the Netflix Creative Arts Emmy after-party at Hotel Figueroa.

Best Pattern Mixing: Batsheva Hay, Arden Wohl and Jonah Freeman

Photo: Tiffany Sage/BFA.com

At ARAKS Lingerie on Film 2019 release.
description: This week’s best party pics feature Iris Law, El Johnson, and Julia Varvara. Who wore the best look?
